title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 400.5 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 400.5 - Subpoenas

State Regulations

Subpoenas may be issued by the administrative law judge or
any attorney for a party who has been duly admitted to the practice of law in
the State of New York. Subpoenas shall be served in any manner permitted by the

Civil Practice Law and Rules unless otherwise provided by applicable statutes
administered by this department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
400.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
